needs: Seeks part-time (20h/wk) corporate counsel roles advising General Counsel or Managing Partner in Kigali, focused on delivering measurable outcomes quickly. Aims to reduce drafting time and transaction cycle, instrument signals and SLOs, close M&A/contracts within initial 90 days while operating under governance, budget constraints, and ambiguity.
personality: Direct, transparent, and data-driven communicator who turns ambiguity into measurable milestones. Prefers small probes, experiments over debates, and lightweight artifacts—decision logs, runbooks and concise demos—to maintain momentum. Values craft, velocity and learning, mentors through pairing, and enforces clear accountability while embedding security, simplicity and observability into processes.
